<Extension()> Public Sub Vibrate (vibration As IVibration, duration As Double)
static member Vibrate : Microsoft.Maui.Devices.IVibration * double -> unit

Docs.param: The object this method is invoked on.
The time to vibrate for. This value will be ignored on iOS as it only supports a vibration of 500ms.
Docs.summary: Vibrates the device for the specified time in the range [0, 5000]ms.
